title: Yankee Stadium
icp_evaluation: **Score: 10/10** - Yankee Stadium is a professional MLB stadium in a major US metropolitan area (Bronx, NY) with a **46,537** capacity, **59,564** reviews, top-tier attendance, and high traffic from recurring events, perfectly matching the ICP for large sports venues with significant fan experience and operations impact[1][2][3].

title: Citi Field
icp_evaluation: Score: 10/10 - **Citi Field** is a professional MLB stadium for the New York Mets with a capacity of ~41,900, 28,969 reviews, high visitor traffic from recurring games, and professional operations in a major US metro area (NYC), perfectly matching the ICP for large sports venues with impact potential in concessions and fan experience[1][2].

title: AT&T Stadium
icp_evaluation: **Score: 10/10** - AT&T Stadium is a perfect ICP match as a professional NFL stadium with 100,000+ capacity, massive visitor traffic (45k+ reviews, 16M+ annual area visitors), recurring high-profile events like Super Bowls and concerts, and professional management in a major US metro area (Arlington, TX), ideal for enhancing concessions, sustainability, and fan experiences.[1][2][3][4]

title: Allegiant Stadium
address: 3333 Al Davis Way, Las Vegas, NV 89118
icp_evaluation: Score: 9/10 - Allegiant Stadium is an exceptional ICP match as a major professional sports venue with 65,000 capacity[1], 12,767 reviews indicating significant visitor traffic[2], professional operations hosting the NFL Raiders and UNLV football[2], and extensive event spaces supporting food & beverage and fan experience enhancement opportunities[4].

title: Las Vegas Ballpark
address: 1650 S Pavilion Center Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89135
icp_evaluation: **Score: 9/10** - Las Vegas Ballpark is a professional Triple-A stadium with 10,000+ capacity, high attendance (e.g., 650,934 in 2019), 4.8 rating from 2201 reviews, and recurring events in a major US metro area (Las Vegas), perfectly aligning with ICP for large sports venues focused on fan experience and operations[1][2][5][7][8]. Minor deduction as it's not a major league facility, but still an ideal match for concessions and sustainability improvements.

title: Gerald J. Ford Stadium
